products.title: Eco Friendly Fr Grey Recycled Roller Blind
products.description: Their eco-friendly, recycled roller blinds are made from 100% pet recycled waste. This means that you can decorate your window with your new sustainable blind, and contribute positively to the environment. For every sq. Metre of fabric, 9 pet bottles are used, so you'll be positively contributing to the fight on plastic pollution, as well as getting a stylish blind. Made with a moisture-resistant and flame-retardant coating, your new cream roller blind can be just the thing to complete your bathroom or kitchen.

products.title: Santiago Blackout Pale Mist Roller Blind
products.description: Simple, clean and completely unfussy. This santiago pale mist roller blind is the perfect finishing touch to a sleek, easy scheme. It's even blackout too for that added practical edge. There's not really much else to say about this blind, other than if it's modern shading you're simple, clean and completely unfussy.

products.title: Santiago Blackout Touchstone Grey Roller Blind
products.description: Grey really is the modern neutral, the go-anywhere and look great with anything shade, not to mention smart and crisp. With this chic roller though theres just a hint of an earthy tone to the grey, adding a little warmth and a more homely feel. Its a blackout fabric too, s grey really is the modern neutral, the go-anywhere and look great with anything shade, not to mention smart and crisp.
